general.gigTitle: convert website to app, ios app and android app,  pro mobile app development

sellerCard.description:
Hi üëã, I am senior mobile developer with +7 years experience. I can convert any kind of website into outstanding Android and iOS app. Your app will look just like your website, when you change the website, the app will also be changed automatically. 
 
If you have an Shopify store, I can turn it into a professional native app with great-looking design. The products and collections will sync automatically with your store. 

You‚Äôre going to love how easy and smooth your new app works. Don‚Äôt hesitate to reach out with your website. Let‚Äôs get started today! Thank you! ‚úåÔ∏è

description.content:
will convert your website to Android app and iOS app using Flutter. It will be a premium app and every functionality of your website will work on iOS and Android apps without any problem. 


The apps will exactly look like your website and whenever you make any changes to your website then the apps will be updated automatically. 


Lastly, I will provide you Admin panel with that you will be able to manage the app's features(intro screens, notification, AdMob, permission...) & themes remotely on fly. 


Features(iOS & Android): Included for all the packages!

  • Admin Panel
  • Splash Screen(Animated, Native)
  • Rich Firebase Notification(with Link and Image)
  • Bottom Navigation Bar(PRO Design)
  • App Rating(ask users to rate app)
  • External Link Support(whatsapp, maps, instagram...)
  • Google Analytics(see how many users active)
  • App Permissions(camera, location, disk, microphone...)
  • Page Loading Screen
  • No Internet Screen
  • Intro Screens
  • AdMob Integration
  • Deep Links
  • Pull Down to Refresh
  • iOS Native Swipe to Back


CONTACT ME FOR DEMO


100% PREMIUM SERVƒ∞CE GUARANTEED

100% APPROVAL GUARANTEED

PLEASE CONTACT ME BEFORE ORDERING


Thank you.

slide.name: convert website to app, ios app and android app,  pro mobile app development
convert website to app, ios app and android app,  pro mobile app development
convert website to app, ios app and android app,  pro mobile app development

questionsAndAnswers.question: Do you have a demo?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
Yes, at first I will send you demo videos that will show you how the complete application works. 

Furthermore, In case you want, I will provide you a demo for your website to let you see how does it work!

questionsAndAnswers.question: How do you work?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will test the apps(iOS & Android) before the submission. If you find any problem In the test, I will try to solve them all. You will complete the order after submissions is done. However, I will give you free support on releasing process if the app would be rejected by apple or google.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How can I access to Admin Panel?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: You will be able to access to the Admin Panel via Internet Browser. I will give you the link and access credentials on the delivery.

questionsAndAnswers.question: What will you deliver?
questionsAndAnswers.answer:
I will deliver the order after app's submissions are done.

Here is the files that I will deliver; app's source code (Flutter), google play JKS & key files and admin panel access informations.

questionsAndAnswers.question: When I change the website, will the app be updated automatically?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes, whenever you change the website, the app will be updated automatically.

questionsAndAnswers.question: Will the apps have AdMob Integration to display ads?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! For free! You will need to send me the App ID for each (Android and/or iOS) and also the Banner ID and/or Interstitial ID and/or App Open ID of each. Just make sure you don't have AdSense on the website because Google does not allow you to have both.

questionsAndAnswers.question: How does notification works? Is it unlimited?
questionsAndAnswers.answer: Yes! It is unlimited. Furthermore, you will be able to push notification with image and link. When user click on the notification, the link will be opened in the app. I will show you how to push it to users. Please contact me to see its demo.

consultationData.description: I will guide you how you can handle your web or mobile development yourself or together. We will discuss what you need and milestone your work into smaller parts to be completed.
